headline: Can Clorox’s (CLX) New Electronics Wipes Reinforce Its Premium Brand Strategy?
summary: Earlier this week, CloroxPro launched Clorox Screen+ Sanitizing Wipes, a new product specifically developed to clean and sanitize delicate electronics such as touchscreens, laptops, and keyboards without causing damage. This introduction targets a key gap in workplace hygiene, as many available electronic wipes do not sanitize, despite strong demand for safe and effective cleaning solutions in increasingly tech-focused environments. We'll examine how this innovation in electronic sanitizing...
